Login.pageDescription: Login to access and take part in the prediction game

passwordForm.cardDescription: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

Error.cardTitle: We've had trouble fullfiling your request
Error.cardContent: While processing your request an unexpected error happened. We've saved the error and will work on fixing it.

metadata.title: Tippspiel | Cockpit
metadata.description: The latest results and upcoming matches

game.pointsInfo: You get 1 point for each correct goal prediction, you also get a point for the correct goal difference, if you guessed the winner correctly this will also give a point and you get an extrapoint if you guessed the result correctly

password.minLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long
password.pattern: The password must contain at least one number, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one special character
password.required: The password can be up to 100 characters long
